title: The Toucher and Rich Show
text:
Toucher and Rich is a Marconi Award-winning morning <a href="radio%20show">radio show</a> from 6 to 10 AM on The Sports Hub 98.5 <a href="WBZ-FM">WBZ-FM</a>, in <a href="Boston%2C%20Massachusetts">Boston, Massachusetts</a>. The show first aired on June 5, 2006. On August 13, 2009, following the demise of <a href="WBCN%20%28FM%29">WBCN</a>, the show moved to <a href="sports%20radio">sports talk</a> station <a href="WBZ-FM">WBZ-FM</a> 98.5 The Sports Hub. Toucher & Rich celebrated their 10th anniversary on August 16, 2016, selling out the <a href="Wilbur%20Theatre">Wilbur Theatre</a> for a special 10th Anniversary show, with numerous guests as well as the finals of 98 Mile year 4.
On September 24, 2016, Toucher & Rich received the Marconi Award, the highest award in radio for Major Market Personality of the Year.
From August 17, 2015 until July 13, 2018, the show was simulcast on <a href="NBC%20Sports%20Boston">NBC Sports Boston</a>. The show is now streamed live on <a href="Twitch%20%28service%29">Twitch</a>.
From June 5, 2006 until mid-2007 the show's opening theme was "<a href="Survival%20of%20the%20Sickest%20%28album%29">Fuck All Y'all</a>" by <a href="Saliva%20%28band%29">Saliva</a>. Since 2007, save for a brief period of time after the show moved to WBZ-FM, the opening theme is "<a href="Honey%20Bucket%20%28song%29">Honey Bucket</a>" by <a href="Melvins">Melvins</a>.
"Toucher and Rich" entered regional <a href="Radio%20syndication">syndication</a> on October 25, 2021. The program's inaugural affilates consisted of four <a href="Townsquare%20Media">Townsquare Media</a> stations: the <a href="trimulcast">trimulcast</a> of <a href="WCYY">WCYY</a> in <a href="Portland%2C%20Maine">Portland, Maine</a>, <a href="WPKQ">WPKQ</a> in <a href="North%20Conway%2C%20New%20Hampshire">North Conway, New Hampshire</a>, and <a href="WJZN">WJZN</a> in <a href="Augusta%2C%20Maine">Augusta, Maine</a>; and <a href="WEZQ">WEZQ</a> in <a href="Bangor%2C%20Maine">Bangor, Maine</a>.
